de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database

Class AbstractDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.result.AbstractHierarchicalResult
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.AbstractDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Database, HierarchicalResult, Result
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HashmapDatabase, ProxyDatabase, StaticArrayDatabase

    public abstract class AbstractDatabase
extends AbstractHierarchicalResult
implements Database
    Abstract base class for database API implementations. Provides default management of relations, indexes and events as well as default query matching. Note: when debugging index usage, set logging for this package to FINEST via -enableDebug de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database=FINEST
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      • getKNNQuery

        public <O> KNNQuery<O> getKNNQuery(DistanceQuery<O> distanceQuery,
                          Object... hints)
        Description copied from interface: Database
        Get a KNN query object for the given distance query. An index is used when possible, but it may fall back to a linear scan. Hints include:
        • Integer: maximum value for k needed
        • DatabaseQuery.HINT_BULK bulk query needed
        Specified by:
        getKNNQuery in interface Database
        Type Parameters:
        O - Object type
        Parameters:
        distanceQuery - Distance query
        hints - Optimizer hints
        Returns:
        KNN Query object

      • getRangeQuery

        public <O> RangeQuery<O> getRangeQuery(DistanceQuery<O> distanceQuery,
                              Object... hints)
        Description copied from interface: Database
        Get a range query object for the given distance query for radius-based neighbor search. (Range queries in ELKI refers to radius-based ranges, not rectangular query windows.) An index is used when possible, but it may fall back to a linear scan. Hints include:
        • Double: Maximum query range that will be used.
        • DatabaseQuery.HINT_BULK bulk query needed
        Specified by:
        getRangeQuery in interface Database
        Type Parameters:
        O - Object type
        Parameters:
        distanceQuery - Distance query
        hints - Optimizer hints
        Returns:
        KNN Query object

      • getSimilarityRangeQuery

        public <O> RangeQuery<O> getSimilarityRangeQuery(SimilarityQuery<O> simQuery,
                                        Object... hints)
        Description copied from interface: Database
        Get a range query object for the given distance query for radius-based neighbor search. (Range queries in ELKI refers to radius-based ranges, not rectangular query windows.) An index is used when possible, but it may fall back to a linear scan. Hints include:
        • Double: Minimum query similarity that will be used.
        • DatabaseQuery.HINT_BULK bulk query needed
        Specified by:
        getSimilarityRangeQuery in interface Database
        Type Parameters:
        O - Object type
        Parameters:
        simQuery - Similarity query
        hints - Optimizer hints
        Returns:
        KNN Query object

        Specified by:

        See Also:
        DataStoreEvent

      • flushDataStoreEvents

        public void flushDataStoreEvents()
        Description copied from interface: Database
        Fires all collected insertion, deletion and update events as one DataStoreEvent, i.e. notifies all registered DataStoreListener how the content of the database has been changed since Database.accumulateDataStoreEvents() has been called.
        Specified by:
        flushDataStoreEvents in interface Database
        See Also:
        DataStoreListener, DataStoreEvent
